thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Kelly Easton
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Kelly Easton

author: Kelly Easton
title: Kelly Easton
text: I accidentally found Ruby Lane while searching a description on Google a description of my favorite long lost ring. To my surprise, it popped up on Purrfect Treasures at Ruby Lane. I couldn't believe it! Yes, it was higher than when I purchased it over 2 decades ago but the price of gold has gone up, but it was still reasonably priced. When I put the ring on, it was like it was never gone. I've started recommending Ruby Lane to all my online shopping friends!
